content: Known for her role in "The Devil Wears Prada," this actress won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2013 for her role in "Les Misérables." Who is she?
Meryl Streep is known for her role in "The Devil Wears Prada," and she won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2013 for her role in "Les Misérables."
